hooks.prompt: Check if Claude made any code changes (Edit, Write, or Bash commands that modified files) during this conversation. If code changes were made, respond with exactly this JSON: {"decision":"block","reason":"Code changes were made. Run mix precommit, fix any errors, and re-run mix precommit until it passes cleanly."}. If no code changes were made (only read/search/conversation), respond with exactly this JSON: {"decision":"allow"}.
